title: 79/318. UN80 Initiative

A/RES/79/318
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: General 
18 July 2025 
25-11845 (E) 
*2511845* 
 
 
Seventy-ninth session 
Agenda item 123 (a) 
Strengthening of the United Nations system: 
strengthening of the United Nations system 
 
 
 
 
 Resolution adopted by the General Assembly 
on 18 July 2025 
 
 
[without reference to a Main Committee (A/79/L.99)] 
 
 
 79/318. UN80 Initiative 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Recalling the purposes and principles of the Charter of the United Nations, 
 
Underlining the important role and comparative advantage of an adequately 
resourced, relevant, coherent, efficient and effective United Nations system in 
promoting international cooperation, 
 
Recalling the role of the Secretary-General as the chief administrative officer of 
the Organization, in accordance with Article 97 of the Charter, 
 
Recognizing the central role of Member States in the reform process, which 
should be inclusive and transparent, 
 
1. 
Welcomes the efforts of the Secretary-General to strengthen the United 
Nations in order to keep pace with a changing world and to make it fit for the present 
and future challenges; 
 
2. 
Looks forward to receiving, in accordance with established procedures, the 
relevant proposals of the Secretary-General in the framework of his UN80 initiative, 
taking into account the necessity to have clearly defined objectives and an evidence-
based approach, and aiming at strengthening the impact of the United Nations and 
enhancing its agility, responsiveness and resilience while addressing the issue of 
duplicative efforts and ensuring effective and efficient mandate delivery across all 
three pillars of the work of the United Nations; 

A/RES/79/318 
UN80 Initiative
 
25-11845
2/2 
 
 
3. 
Calls upon the entities and specialized agencies of the United Nations 
system to align their reform efforts with this approach, as appropriate.  
 
85th plenary meeting 
18 July 2025
